attributes.action: Change income tax so it is based on combined earnings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment you get charged Basic Rate on a second income, including occupational pensions.  Some people earn a minimum ammount from a second income yet are charged at Basic Rate, this is unfair as combine earnings maybe less than £12,000 a year so introduce a penalty on people who are not on a high income and is unfair.
